channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked gully in front of cycle shed, 24th July
item.description:
Leaf biomass still blocking drain gully beneath grate. A more comprehensive removal is required to unblock.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Villas, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes in pavement, 24th July
item.description:
There are DEEP potholes in the pavement outside the entrance to Bromley Golf Centre. They are a hazard to vehicles and pedestrians. Needs filling in with asphalt ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oak Processionary Moth (OPM) nests, 24th July
item.description:
OPM nests seen on 3 trees in Beckenham Place Park in July 2025 Oak at What 3 Words///cheese.laser.locals had 1 nest. Oak at What 3 Words///nearly.valid.noting had 2 nests. Oak at What 3 Words///cracks.taken.bells has 1 old nest and 1 new nest.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Calverley Close, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unstable blind persons pavement slab, 24th July
item.description:
There is an unstable paving slab (textured for blind people). It is located outside 152 Waterloo Road (on the corner of Pret-A-Manger). This needs to be fixed to avoid a blind person falling over it or even a sighted person falling over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baylis Road, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temp traffic lights near 183 Southborough Lane, 24th July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Southborough, London

item.title: Pothole on zebra crossing between 168 and 170 haverstock hill, 24th July
item.description:
There is large pothole in almost the middle of the zebra crossing between 168 and 170 haverstock hill . The issue has been there for a while .Every time a bus or lorry passes , it shaking my house . Please repair to avoid structural damage to my house . Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haverstock Hill, Belsize Park, London
